Miniature Donkey
About

About

The author of Miniature Donkey is a life-long learner with a wide range of interdisciplinary interests. She is curious to see if writing about them will help her better organize her thoughts, leave a record for her future self, and perhaps offer something for others to learn from, much like how she enjoys reading the blogs of others.

Blog posts includes ruminations on philosophy, politics, culture, travel, art, ethics, technology and explorations of the human conditions such as passion, curiosity, social connection and more.
